scripts.build:linux: npm run prebuild && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/mentator-ddl-creator && chmod +x dist/mentator-ddl-creator
scripts.build:win: npm run prebuild && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/mentator-ddl-creator.exe
scripts.buildjs: npm run prebuild && node_modules/.bin/tsc --outDir distjs && tsc-esm-fix distjs
